metadata.title: Vectors of Movement — Passage, Weather, and Terrain
metadata.summary: Listings for spirits engaged when travel must be controlled, storms weaponized, or infrastructure rewritten in hours instead of weeks.

references.title: The Goetia of Dr. Rudd
references.author: Stephen Skinner & David Rankine
references.note: Annotated rituals for restraining Agares, Gaap, and allied movers.

references.title: Grimorium Verum
references.author: Anonymous
references.note: Source for maritime protections countering Focalor and Vine.

references.title: Architectures of the Mirage
references.author: Sister Aurelia of Tyre
references.note: Treatise on rearranging terrain without collapsing local leys.

body: Summon from this index to seize pathways: the listed spirits redirect wind, open gates, or rewrite stone, letting a campaign outpace any mortal logistics.

Agares — Purpose: Unsettle enemy ranks by eroding morale and language cohesion. Manifestation: elder rider on a crocodile commanding deserters. Favours: vellum inscribed with contradictory proverbs pinned to door lintels. Wards: salt traced across thresholds and rehearsed countersigns maintain cohesion.

Focalor — Purpose: Command coastal weather and scuttle fleets without direct engagement. Manifestation: winged man with a green beard rising from crashing surf. Favours: brine-filled chalices veiled in stormcloth. Wards: tarred cords knotted thrice and offerings of fresh water to neutral maritime spirits.

Gaap — Purpose: Relocate people or objects instantly across liminal points. Manifestation: prince arriving at noonday flanked by four heralds bearing keys. Favours: silver keys kept warm against the skin and presented in mirrored pairs. Wards: braid alternating metals into doorway lintels; announce every departure to anchor space.

Malphas — Purpose: Raise or dismantle infrastructure—towers, safe houses, or siege engines—overnight. Manifestation: crow-headed architect surrounded by phantom masons. Favours: freshly hewn timber dusted with salt and aligned by compass. Wards: recite inventory tallies while demolishing any unsolicited structure to deny covert roosts.

Vine — Purpose: Reshape earth and conjure storms to obscure advances or expose hidden defenses. Manifestation: lion astride a black horse, carrying a viper entwined around his arm. Favours: blackthorn staves carved with spiral grooves and soaked in rainwater. Wards: bury nine iron nails in concentric circles around the worksite to ground his upheavals.
